comments.body:
Add comment for test case:
```
// Tooltip should be present when [PopupMenuButton.child] is defined
```

Add comment for test case:
```
// Tooltip should be present when [PopupMenuButton.icon] is defined
```

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/wiki/Style-guide-for-Flutter-repo#prefer-single-quotes-for-strings
```suggestion

```

The guide you linked states "Use double quotes for [...] strings that contain single quotes." That was the reason I adjusted it. Let me know what you think, but the suggestion does not work because there is a single quote in the string.
I did not notice the apostrophe/single quote in the string. This is fine :) Thank you!

Maybe add a comment here that suggests that the menu item should be focused after tapping on the button, since I wasn't sure if the focus would automatically set on the first item or not (but then again, it might just be my unfamiliarity with focus and this should have been pretty obvious to anyone else).
Done. I added some more comments above too, to explain what was happening.
